sentences.sContent: The coating has good tenacity and wearability.
sentences.sContent_eng: The coating has good tenacity and wearability.
sentences.sCn: 涂层具有良好的韧性和耐磨性能。

sentences.sContent: High strength, good rigidity and tenacity, good heat and seawater resisting, good Cl resisting, suitable for high performance products.
sentences.sContent_eng: High strength, good rigidity and tenacity, good heat and seawater resisting, good Cl resisting, suitable for high performance products.
sentences.sCn: 高机械强度，高耐热性，韧性好，具有较好的耐海水、耐氯性。适用于高性能制品。

remMethod.val: ten (拿住) + acity → 拿住不放 → 坚韧

words.tran: 顽强的；坚韧的；固执的；紧握的；黏着力强的
